scripts.dev: npm run clean:dist && cd src/ && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && cd src/ && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s"
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s"
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major -m "chore(release): %s"
